content.text: Match ends, Juventus 1, LA Galaxy 3.
Second Half ends, Juventus 1, LA Galaxy 3.
Goal!  Juventus 1, LA Galaxy 3. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner.
Foul by Federico Peluso (Juventus).
Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Fernando Llorente (Juventus) left footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Mirko Vucinic.
Substitution, LA Galaxy. Brian Perk replaces Landon Donovan.
Substitution, LA Galaxy. Laurent Courtois replaces Robbie Rogers.
Substitution, LA Galaxy. Rafael García replaces Juninho.
Attempt missed. Fernando Llorente (Juventus) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box misses to the left. Assisted by Sebastian Giovinco with a cross.
Attempt blocked. Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from long range on the left is blocked. Assisted by Landon Donovan.
Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Angelo Ogbonna.
Attempt blocked. Robbie Rogers (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Juninho.
Substitution, Juventus. Federico Peluso replaces Andrea Barzagli.
Attempt missed. Sebastian Giovinco (Juventus) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Arturo Vidal.
